Package local.intranet.tombola.api.service

Class LoggingEventService

java.lang.Object
local.intranet.tombola.api.service.LoggingEventService
@Service public class LoggingEventService extends Object
LoggingEventService for TombolaApplication

An entity LoggingEvent without setters is only used to read data written by logback-spring DbAppender
